overview: Saber works as a courier in one of the governmental interests, who raises his son Mahmoud until he graduates, and seeks with the director to appoint him, Mahmoud denies his father, marries Lula Shushu's sister who runs a prostitution home, and embezzles an amount from the company to meet the needs of his wife, so Saber knows what his son did He seeks to manage the embezzled amount, so that his son does not imprison
title: Wa Belwaleden Ehsana
